function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases in urban green spaces during a time of social crisis.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases leading to higher infection rates and greater strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implementing appropriate social distancing measures, regular disinfection of public facilities, and promoting outdoor activities that minimize close contact.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, automated disinfection systems, and mobile apps for managing park capacity.","People":"Residents and visitors of urban green spaces, especially those living in densely populated areas.","Owner":"Local government authorities, public health agencies, park operators."},{"Description":"Governance challenges in managing urban green spaces during the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Inadequate management leading to crowded public spaces, inadequate sanitation, and failure to enforce safety measures, resulting in increased disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing clear policies for park management, investing in sanitation and hygiene infrastructure, and providing training for park staff on disease prevention measures.","Technologies":"Park capacity monitoring systems, automated sanitation systems, and data analytics for crowd management.","People":"Urban residents, park visitors, park staff, and local government officials.","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, local government agencies, and park management organizations."}]}
